Download PerfectIt

Proofreading software for professionals

  • Edit faster

  • Submit better documents

  • Make the best impression

Start Free Trial >

No credit card details required.

Find out why PerfectIt™ is loved by editors and writing professionals in over 70 countries.

It’s all about consistency

Consistent documents make a better impact

Documents that have inconsistencies in things like spelling, numerals, hyphenation, and capitalization look sloppy and unprofessional and can affect your reputation. A tiny mistake can have big consequences. Consistency checks are time-consuming but essential.

PerfectIt saves you time finding and fixing mistakes

PerfectIt scans your whole document for difficult-to-locate errors, such as missing acronym definitions, capitalization inconsistencies, and common misspellings. This saves hours of manual checks and frees you up to focus on more substantive work.

Are you ready for a faster way to edit?

Buy Now
Try For Free

Used by over 10,000 companies and professionals worldwide

Check consistency

 Save hours checking documents for hard-to-find consistency mistakes such as variants in hyphenation, capitalization, and spelling.

Locate undefined acronyms

Identify acronyms that are undefined, defined multiple times and defined differently. Produce a list of all acronyms used in a document.

Enforce style rules

Check that your documents adhere to your house style or individual client or industry style preferences.

Check consistency of regional spelling

Ensure your documents use consistent and appropriate spelling for your audience and that writing is consistent from multiple contributors.

Ensure documents speak
with one voice

Maintain brand consistency and create a cohesive and clear message for your readers.

Check tables and lists

Ensure consistent punctuation in bullets and numbered lists and that tables are numbered and titled consistently.

Save time so you can focus on what matters most

Buy Now
Learn More

Check for The Chicago Manual of Style

Do you use Chicago style? CMOS Online subscribers can use PerfectIt to check against the Manual’s guidance.

00:00
01:55
% buffered00:00
Learn more

No internet connection necessary

Complies with the strictest privacy and security policies

Your documents are secure

The Windows edition of PerfectIt gives you the highest level of security possible. It doesn't connect to the internet or any local network. So your documents never leave your computer.

If you choose PerfectIt Cloud (Mac-compatible), it sends your document securely to the cloud and deletes it after you've finished checking. No one other than you has access to your document at any time.

Trusted by business professionals worldwide

PerfectIt is the leading software among professional proofreaders and editors. From translators and lawyers to proposal managers and medical writers, a wide range of professionals in 72 countries rely on PerfectIt to improve their documents.

Try PerfectIt free for 14 days

Get a free 14-day trial with no credit card information required.

Buy Now
Free Trial

Be the first to know

Subscribe to our newsletter to receive our latest articles and insights, product news, and exclusive deals.

Thank you!

We respect your privacy.
